cause.description:
dis group basically aims at lending your support to those suffrenig from thi disease..be a part of it thos noble cause and be proud of it..
My mother tells me prayer will help. I think it won't, but try again: "Look hard; their wings are white as milk, and if you smile, they'll sometimes grin."
I looked so hard it hurt my eyes. But she was right. I saw blue lips and baby teeth, heard milky cries floating toward me like small ships.
You're healed. Go unknown boy; go home. Your herd awaits the winter hay. But I was being nibbled down and soon would be as real as they.
1. the best way for a nation to progress is to make it healthy first..
cause.name: leprosy a threat to dere future...
